item.title: Favorite Holiday
item.description: Halloween U can reflect ur fav character With friendsm, school spirit Brother

item.title: git learning push
item.description: To push changes of website from .md to github through git First time: 1. git init 2. git add . 3. git status 4. git commit -m "first commit" 5. git branch -M main 6. git remote add origin https://github.com/ireneyrzd/Homepage.git 7. git push -u origin main After origin and main has been initialized: 1. git status 2. git add <file> 3. git rm <file> 4. git status 5. git commit -m "commit comment" 6.
